Software Development.description: Build modern software applications and systems

1.title: Programming Fundamentals
1.description: Master the basics of programming with Python or Java. Learn variables, loops, conditions, and functions.
1.outcome: Ability to write basic programs and solve simple algorithmic problems

1.title: Data Structures Basics
1.description: Learn fundamental data structures like arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues.
1.outcome: Understand how to organize and manipulate data efficiently

1.title: Web Development Introduction
1.description: Learn HTML, CSS, and basic JavaScript to build static websites.

1.title: Version Control
1.description: Master Git and GitHub for collaborative coding and version management.
1.outcome: Manage code versions and collaborate on team projects

2.title: Advanced Data Structures
2.description: Study trees, graphs, heaps, and hash tables. Practice solving medium-level problems.
2.outcome: Solve 100+ DSA problems and optimize solutions

2.title: Backend Development
2.description: Learn server-side programming with Node.js, Express, or Django.
2.outcome: Build RESTful APIs and connect them to databases

2.title: Database Management
2.description: Master SQL and NoSQL databases. Learn CRUD operations and query optimization.
2.outcome: Design and manage relational and non-relational databases

2.title: Frontend Framework
2.description: Learn React, Vue, or Angular for building dynamic single-page applications.

3.title: System Design Fundamentals
3.description: Learn how to design scalable systems. Understand load balancing, caching, and microservices.
3.outcome: Design scalable systems handling millions of users

3.title: DevOps and Cloud
3.description: Learn Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud platforms like AWS or Azure.
3.outcome: Deploy applications to cloud with automated pipelines

3.title: Full-Stack Projects
3.description: Build 2-3 production-ready full-stack applications with authentication and payment integration.
3.outcome: Complete portfolio with deployed full-stack applications

3.title: Open Source Contribution
3.description: Start contributing to open-source projects on GitHub. Learn collaborative development.
3.outcome: Make 10+ meaningful contributions to open source

4.title: Advanced System Design
4.description: Master distributed systems, message queues, and real-time architectures.

4.title: Interview Preparation
4.description: Practice advanced DSA, system design interviews, and behavioral questions.
4.outcome: Clear interviews at top tech companies

4.title: Specialization Track
4.description: Choose a specialization: Mobile Development, Cloud Architecture, or Security.

4.title: Portfolio and Personal Brand
4.description: Build a strong GitHub profile, technical blog, and LinkedIn presence.
4.outcome: Stand out in job market with strong online presence

Data Science.description: Analyze data and build machine learning models

1.title: Python for Data Science
1.description: Master Python programming with focus on data manipulation and analysis.
1.outcome: Write Python scripts for data analysis tasks

1.title: Mathematics Foundation
1.description: Build strong foundation in linear algebra, calculus, and probability.
1.outcome: Understand mathematical concepts behind ML algorithms

1.title: Data Visualization
1.description: Learn to create insightful visualizations using Matplotlib and Seaborn.
1.outcome: Create compelling visual stories from data

1.title: SQL and Databases
1.description: Master SQL queries for data extraction and manipulation.
1.outcome: Extract and analyze data from relational databases

2.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
2.description: Learn supervised learning algorithms: regression, classification, and decision trees.
2.outcome: Build predictive models for real-world problems

2.title: Feature Engineering
2.description: Master techniques for preparing and transforming data for ML models.
2.outcome: Improve model performance through better features

2.title: Statistical Analysis
2.description: Learn hypothesis testing, A/B testing, and statistical inference.
2.outcome: Make data-driven decisions using statistical methods

2.title: Kaggle Competitions
2.description: Participate in 3-5 Kaggle competitions to apply ML skills.
2.outcome: Build competitive ML models and earn Kaggle medals

3.title: Deep Learning
3.description: Master neural networks, CNNs, and RNNs using TensorFlow or PyTorch.
3.outcome: Build deep learning models for image and text data

3.title: Natural Language Processing
3.description: Learn text processing, sentiment analysis, and language models.
3.outcome: Build NLP applications like chatbots and classifiers

3.title: Big Data Tools
3.description: Work with large-scale data using Spark and distributed computing.
3.outcome: Process and analyze terabytes of data efficiently

3.title: MLOps Fundamentals
3.description: Learn to deploy and monitor ML models in production.
3.outcome: Deploy ML models as production APIs

4.title: Advanced Deep Learning
4.description: Master GANs, transformers, and state-of-the-art architectures.

4.title: Computer Vision
4.description: Specialize in image processing, object detection, and segmentation.

4.title: Time Series Analysis
4.description: Master forecasting techniques for temporal data.

4.title: Portfolio and Job Prep
4.description: Create data science portfolio, prepare for interviews, and network.
4.outcome: Land data science roles at top companies

1.title: GATE Foundation
1.description: Build strong foundation in core engineering subjects for GATE exam.
1.outcome: Complete 40% of GATE syllabus with conceptual clarity

1.title: General Aptitude
1.description: Master quantitative aptitude, logical reasoning, and verbal ability.

1.title: Current Affairs
1.description: Stay updated with national and international current affairs.
1.outcome: Build strong GK foundation for all exams

1.title: Technical Writing
1.description: Develop clear technical writing skills for descriptive answers.

2.title: GATE Intensive Preparation
2.description: Complete GATE syllabus with focus on high-weightage topics.
2.outcome: Complete 100% GATE syllabus and solve 500+ problems

2.title: UPSC CSE Prelims
2.description: Start preparation for UPSC Civil Services Preliminary examination.

2.title: SSC Preparation
2.description: Prepare for SSC CGL, CHSL, and other staff selection exams.
2.outcome: Clear SSC Tier-1 with good marks

2.title: Mock Tests
2.description: Take regular full-length mock tests for time management.

3.title: GATE Advanced Topics
3.description: Master advanced topics and take intensive test series.
3.outcome: Score 55+ marks in GATE to qualify for PSUs

3.title: PSU Preparation
3.description: Prepare specifically for PSU recruitment through GATE.
3.outcome: Get shortlisted in top PSUs like ONGC, NTPC, BHEL

3.title: UPSC Mains Preparation
3.description: Focus on UPSC Mains answer writing and optional subject.

3.title: Banking and Insurance Exams
3.description: Prepare for IBPS, SBI, and insurance sector exams.
3.outcome: Clear bank PO or clerk examinations

4.title: UPSC Interview Preparation
4.description: Prepare for UPSC personality test with mock interviews.
4.outcome: Clear UPSC interview and get final rank

4.title: State Service Exams
4.description: Prepare for state PSC examinations as backup.

4.title: Defense Services
4.description: Prepare for CDS, AFCAT, and NDA if interested.

4.title: Final Exam Strategy
4.description: Take all targeted exams with proper strategy and preparation.
4.outcome: Secure government job in targeted department

Higher Studies.description: Pursue masters or PhD for research and academia

1.title: Academic Excellence
1.description: Maintain high CGPA and build strong fundamentals in core subjects.

1.title: Research Introduction
1.description: Learn basics of research methodology and academic writing.
1.outcome: Understand research process and write first paper review

1.title: English Proficiency
1.description: Start preparing for TOEFL or IELTS for international universities.
1.outcome: Build foundation for 100+ TOEFL or 7+ IELTS

1.title: Identify Research Interest
1.description: Explore different research areas through courses and reading.

2.title: GRE Preparation
2.description: Intensively prepare for GRE exam for MS admissions.

2.title: Research Projects
2.description: Work on 1-2 research projects with professors or independently.
2.outcome: Complete research projects and document findings

2.title: Publication Attempt
2.description: Try to publish research work in conferences or journals.
2.outcome: Submit papers to conferences or journals

2.title: University Research
2.description: Research potential universities and professors for MS or PhD.

3.title: Statement of Purpose
3.description: Write compelling SOP highlighting research interests and goals.
3.outcome: Create strong SOP that stands out

3.title: Letters of Recommendation
3.description: Build relationships with professors for strong recommendation letters.

3.title: Advanced Research
3.description: Work as research assistant or complete thesis project.
3.outcome: Complete significant research contributing to field

3.title: Funding Applications
3.description: Apply for scholarships, fellowships, and assistantships.

4.title: University Applications
4.description: Apply to 10-15 universities with complete application packages.

4.title: Interview Preparation
4.description: Prepare for PhD interviews and MS program discussions.

4.title: Visa Process
4.description: Complete visa application process for selected country.
4.outcome: Obtain student visa for chosen university

4.title: Transition Planning
4.description: Prepare for move abroad including accommodation, insurance, and orientation.
